fields.Name: User Onboarding Flow Agent - System Prompt

fields.Name: Generic Error Message
fields.Description: Generic error message prompt that can be customized based on the error context
fields.TemplateText:
An error occurred: {{ payload.errorMessage }}

Please check the error details and try again.
